steps.name: Click on the element By.id: add-order-product-btn
Wait for the element By.id: add-order-product-btn to be visible
Wait until a modal with title "Thêm Mặt Hàng" is visible
Wait for the element By.xpath: //h2[contains(text(),'Thêm Mặt Hàng')]/ancestor::div[contains(@class, 'Polaris-Modal-Dialog__Modal')] to be visible
Click on the element By.id: add-order-product-btn
Wait for the element By.id: add-order-product-btn to be visible
Wait until a modal with title "Thêm Mặt Hàng" is visible
Wait for the element By.xpath: //h2[contains(text(),'Thêm Mặt Hàng')]/ancestor::div[contains(@class, 'Polaris-Modal-Dialog__Modal')] to be visible
Clear and fill the input field By.id: quantity--input with value "10"
Wait for the element By.id: quantity--input to be visible
Clear the input field By.id: price--input
Wait for the element By.id: price--input to be visible
Click on the button containing text "Thêm"
Assert that the modal located by By.xpath: //div[contains(@class, 'mall')] is open
Assert that the input field price--input has error text "Giá nhập tối thiểu 1,000VNĐ"
